Description: Power Factor Reference Setpoint Change at 132kV POC of Clements Gap BESS

Clements Gap BESS EMS controller receives the power factor reference setpoint from NSP/AEMO and issues a change in setpoint to the PPM. The PPM then calculates a reactive power setpoint and determines an appropriate control value to be issued to all inverters.
Main transformer tap changer regules the voltage at the 33kV terminals with the voltage deadband.
